Pesto Aioli


Ingredients
1 garlic clove
1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese
1 tablespoon pine nuts, toasted (See Note)
1 cup basil leaves
5 tablespoons olive oil
salt and freshly ground black pepper
mayonnaise as needed

Cooking Instructions

In a food processor add garlic, Parmesan cheese, and pine
nuts. Process until mixture looks like fine breadcrumbs. Add
basil and olive oil and blend to make a smooth mixture.
Season to taste with salt and pepper. Transfer pesto to a
sealed storage container. To make pesto aioli as needed,
stir 2 tablespoons mayonnaise for every 1 tablespoon pesto
together in a bowl; use as a condiment as desired. Store
remaining pesto in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.
